alert.note: Alert for Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 4:20AM EST until January 17 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Steuben and Yates counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM Sunday to 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates tonight could reach up to 1 inch per hour at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
